summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a forwarded message related to a lawsuit claiming that a former firm leader was involved in fraudulent investments in a sex scandal case. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a warning against unauthorized use.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the main subject of the email correspondence, discussing confidential matters related to a lawsuit.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Mortimer Zuckerman
persons.context: Mortimer Zuckerman is mentioned as a recipient in the forwarded message regarding the lawsuit.

persons.context: Story Cowles is mentioned as the sender of a forwarded message that discusses the lawsuit.

keyFacts: The email discusses a lawsuit involving claims of fraudulent investments related to a sex scandal case.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual involved in the email correspondence.
